mapper.select: SELECT o.qr_srl AS qrSrl, o.obj_m AS modelName, o.obj_s AS srlName, o.obj_img AS objImage, o.obj_img_srl AS objSrlImage, o.obj_img_mn AS objModelImage, o.obj_kinds AS objKinds, o.latitude, o.longitude, o.addr, c.company_srl AS companySrl, c.company_name AS companyName, c.addr AS inputAddr, c.detail_addr AS companyDetailAddr, c.phone AS companyPhone, c.latitude AS companyLat, c.longitude AS companyLon, u.user_name AS userName, u.m_number AS userPhone, u.auth FROM obj AS o INNER JOIN company AS c ON o.company_srl = c.company_srl INNER JOIN users AS u ON u.user_srl = o.user_srl WHERE o.qr_srl = #{qrSrl}
mapper.update: INSERT INTO obj_log ( qr_srl, user_srl, obj_status, create_at, holder_name ) VALUES ( #{qrSrl}, #{userSrl}, #{objStatus}, now(), #{holderName} )
mapper.select: SELECT ol.create_at AS createAt, ol.obj_addr AS addr, ol.longitude, ol.latitude, ol.obj_status AS objStatus, ol.holder_name AS holderName, o.addr AS objAddr, u.user_name AS userName, u.auth FROM obj_log AS ol INNER JOIN obj AS o ON ol.qr_srl = o.qr_srl INNER JOIN users u ON ol.user_srl = u.user_srl WHERE ol.qr_srl = #{qrSrl} ORDER BY ol.create_at DESC LIMIT #{limitcount},#{contentnum}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM obj_log AS ol INNER JOIN obj AS o ON ol.qr_srl = o.qr_srl INNER JOIN users u ON o.user_srl = u.user_srl WHERE ol.qr_srl = #{qrSrl}
mapper.update: UPDATE obj SET obj_status = #{objStatus}, obj_status_at = now() WHERE qr_srl = #{qrSrl}
